overview:
FranÃ§ois Lecointe was appointed Corporate Secretary of CrÃ©dit Agricole Private Equity in September 2006. He is member of the Management Board.

He is graduated from Ecole Polytechnique and from Ecole Nationale de Statistique et d’Administration Economique.

FranÃ§ois Lecointe began his career as an economist at the OFCE, before moving to Caisse des DÃ©pÃ´ts (CDC), joining the Economic Research Department. He was appointed head of the department in 1992. From 1995, he managed in-house fixed-income portfolios, then cash management of CDC. In 1999, he was appointed head of Asset-Liabilities-Management and contributed to creating IXIS, of which he became Deputy Finance Director, then Chief Investment Officer. In 2003, he joined Groupe Egis, an engineering company, as CFO and Corporate Secretary. More recently, FranÃ§ois Lecointe participated in creating Meridiam, a fund dedicated to investment in PPP infrastructure assets.
